summary: Adds glowing rings to daedric arrows
descriptionHtml:
All the daedric gear have red glowing parts, all except the arrows. This mod changes that.

This is a simple mesh replacer for the daedric arrows, it adds 4 red glowing rings to the arrows to be more in line with the daedric gear.

This only changes the meshes, textures are untouched.
If you want a good texture replacer I personally use this one:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2797


--Enjoy the mod
pauderek
author: pauderek
